title: A Tennis Match with a Special Story
summary: Aryna Sabalenka, the best women's tennis player, and Nick Kyrgios, a famous tennis star, are playing a fun match in Dubai on December 28. People call it a 'battle of the sexes' because a man and woman are competing, like a famous match from long ago with Billie Jean King and Bobby Riggs. But Billie Jean King says this new match is different. A reporter from the BBC talks to Sabalenka and Kyrgios about why they want to play and why some people are talking about it, especially because of things Kyrgios did before. The reporter also talks to an expert to learn more about what this match means for tennis. This story is part of a podcast called More than the Score that shares cool sports stories every day, not just who wins or loses.

background_read: Tennis is a popular sport played all over the world. Sometimes, players have special matches called exhibitions that are for fun or to raise money. Billie Jean King and Bobby Riggs played a famous 'battle of the sexes' match in 1973, which helped show that women can compete with men in sports. Today, sports stories are often shared through podcasts, which are audio shows you can listen to anytime.
Article_Structure: WHO: Aryna Sabalenka and Nick Kyrgios, two tennis players, with a reporter from the BBC.
WHAT: They are playing an exhibition match in Dubai called a 'battle of the sexes'.
WHERE: The match is in Dubai.
WHY: To have a fun game and talk about why people are interested, including past issues with Kyrgios.

perspectives.description: The match is a chance for fans to see two great players compete in a friendly way.
